title: LITTLE GOBLIN: Master, Don’t Come Here! - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance   Shoujo   Tragedy
tags: Acting   Ancient Times   Appearance Changes   Artificial Intelligence   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Game Elements   Goblins   Interdimensional Travel   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Politics   Royalty   Showbiz   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Sushou Zhezhi   素手折枝
description:
Zhong Qing is expected to die because she was suffering from an incurable disease, but she will come back from the dead and will wake up in a magical white space called 'SYSTEM' that reveals her hidden secret. She will become a little goblin!
 
Before the task, the system was indifferent.
 
Your mission is to accompany the man and help him achieve his peak life.
 
But after the task, she felt love and indignation.
 
You get out of here, system! I thought I would only accompany and help him. You didn’t say that I would fall in love with him! '
 
The system is silently acting as if it is dead.
 
The man had also already fallen in love with Zhong Qing.
 
Honey, come on, go home with me.>
